thread.title: Road: A19 South Yorkshire closed due to accident
thread.title_full: Road: A19 South Yorkshire closed due to accident | Calendar - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Road: A19 South Yorkshire closed due to accident
text:
The A19 Doncaster Road at Carcroft in South Yorkshire is closed in both directions due to an accident.
Three vehicles were in collision between Tiltshill Lane and Rockley Lane/Sutton Road. Traffic is being affected between Doncaster and M62 at Eggborough.
Last updated Mon 21 Sep 2015 Travel South Yorkshire Doncaster
